tool_description: Calculates foundation bearing capacity using various methods (Terzaghi, Meyerhof, Hansen) considering soil properties, foundation geometry, and loading conditions.

foundation_width.description: Foundation width in meters or feet

foundation_length.description: Foundation length in meters or feet

foundation_depth.description: Foundation depth below ground surface in meters or feet

soil_cohesion.description: Soil cohesion in kPa or psf

friction_angle.description: Internal friction angle of soil in degrees

soil_unit_weight.description: Unit weight of soil in kN/mÂ³ or pcf

applied_load.description: Applied vertical load in kN or lbs

water_table_depth.description: Depth to water table below ground surface in meters or feet

calculation_method.description: Bearing capacity calculation method (Terzaghi, Meyerhof, Hansen)

safety_factor.description: Factor of safety for bearing capacity

foundation_type.description: Foundation type (shallow, deep, strip, square, rectangular)

eccentric_loading.description: Whether to consider eccentric loading effects

error_messages: Invalid foundation geometry: All dimensions must be positive numbers
Invalid soil properties: cohesion and unit_weight must be non-negative, friction_angle must be between 0-45 degrees
Unknown calculation method: Use one of [Terzaghi, Meyerhof, Hansen]
Unknown foundation type: Use one of [shallow, deep, strip, square, rectangular]
Invalid applied load: applied_load must be positive
Invalid safety factor: safety_factor must be greater than 1.5
Water table conflict: water_table_depth cannot be negative or above ground surface
usage: Provide foundation dimensions (width, length, depth), soil properties (cohesion, friction_angle, soil_unit_weight), and applied_load. Optionally specify water_table_depth, calculation_method, safety_factor, foundation_type, and eccentric_loading for detailed analysis.

allowable_bearing_capacity.description: Allowable bearing capacity with safety factor

actual_bearing_pressure.description: Actual bearing pressure from applied load

bearing_safety_factor.description: Actual factor of safety against bearing failure
